index.description: The record's unique index or key. This shouldn't be used as a feature.

Date.description: The date the records were taken.

Season.description: Season: spring, summer, winter or fall.

Holiday.description: Whether or not the day is a holiday.

Day of Week.description: The day of the week: 0 (Sunday) to 6 (Saturday).

Workday.description: Whether or not this is a work day.

Weather Description.description: A description of the day's weather, ranging from a few clouds to light snow or rain.

Average Temperature (Celsius).description: Average temperature in Celsius, normalized to a 0 to 1 scale where 0 = -8 degrees celsius and 1 equals 39 degrees celsius.

Average \"Feels Like\" Temperature.description: Average "feels like" temperature in Celsius, normalized to a 0 to 1 scale where 0 = -16 degrees celsius and 1 equals 50 degrees celsius.

Humidity (0 - 1).description: Humidity, normalized to 0 (0% humidity) to 1 (100% humidity).

Number of Casual Users.description: Number of users without an account.

Number of Registered Users.description: Number of users with an account.
